alert.note: Alert for Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Wind Chill Warning issued December 21 at 2:46AM CST until December 24 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 PM CST THURSDAY... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST SATURDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 40 to 50 below zero, with the overall coldest values expected tonight into Thursday morning. For the Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation expected. A light glaze of ice is possible this afternoon before snowfall begins later in the day. Total snow accumulations of one to three inches and ice accumulations up to a couple hundredths of an inch are possible. Wind gusts near 45 mph are expected. * WHERE...Portions of north central Kansas and central, east central and south central Nebraska. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Warning, from 6 PM today to noon CST Saturday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from noon today to 6 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Blowing snow could also significantly reduce visibility...possibly below one quarter of a mile at times this evening and night. These hazardous weather conditions will impact driving. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...There is high confidence that this will be an exceptionally cold period, especially from late tonight through Saturday. There is a lower confidence in overall snowfall amounts.
info.instruction: Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Jewell; Mitchell; Osborne; Phillips; Rooks; Smith
